Notes.Text:
This update for gegl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10113: The process function in operations/external/ppm-load.c has unbounded memory allocation, leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure. (bsc#1089731)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in GEGL through 0.3.32. The process function in operations/external/ppm-load.c has unbounded memory allocation, leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure.
